WorkItem.Description:
I need help to make a progress bar display the web browsers progress- i have tried many things, but it has an out of range exception/
 
 
Can i have help with it??
 
 
I run C# 2010 + .NET 4

Comments.Message:
Hello Hughe,

Thank you for using our free Microsoft All-In-One Code Framework Sample Request Service !   

Do you need a progress bar control in the web application or use a progress bar in the web browser? If you can provide more information, it will be helpful for us to write the sample idea or provide the sample.

If you need a progress bar control in the web application, you can refer the following link:
http://www.nuget.org/packages/jQuery.UI.Widgets.Progressbar.

Please let us know if this sample is helpful to you.


Thanks and have a great day!
